text: Ra Anumzamo'a amanage hu'ne, Isipi vahe'mo'zama tro hu'naza zantamimo'ene Kusi vahe'mofo zago fenomo'ene zamagima mareri'nea Seba vahe'mo'zanena tamagrike zanke segahaze. Ana nehanageta seni nofiteti kina rezmante'nesage'za tamagri tamefi ne-eza tamagiafi zamarena eme nere'za anage hugahaze, tamagerfa huno Anumzamo'a tamagrane mani'neankino Agrikna anumzana magore huno omani'ne hu'za hugahaze.
